channel.title: ::message command [PI]

item.title: ::message command [PI]
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("message") && c.playerRights >= 3) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("[Server]: " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(8))); } } }

Read full topic

item.title: ::message command [PI]
item.dc:creator: @xtylerr xtylerr
item.description:
@xtylerr wrote:

Well…this is rather annoying. Whenever I type something in ::message, it puts the two letters “Ge” before what I say.

Can you try to find where it’s messed up in the code?

Thanks.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("message") && c.playerRights >= 3) { or (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { f (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("[Server]: " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))); } } }

Read full topic
